categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Kalla's Stanchion was a starfighter carrier in the Alliance Military during the early Galactic Civil War.

The vessel was a heavily modified EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate. The vessel was enlarged to accommodate several hangars in the vessel's midsection and large enough to accommodate vessels as large as a YT-1300 light freighter/Legends.

The vessel was stationed in orbit of Etti IV in the early parts of the Civil War. Three months after the Battle of Yavin, Deena Shan served on board the Stanchion with the Alliance Supplies and Requisitions division.
